clinical_history: Patient with thyroid nodule under assessment.
findings: No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in axillary lymph nodes, suggestive of malignancy.
Physiologic brown fat uptake in supraclavicular region.
Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
recommendations: Correlate with MRI/CT for precise anatomical localization.
